roleset.name: split into two - Not eventive when refering to breasts

example.name: Splitting of a group
example.text: The pollitcal cleavage of the two ethnic groups resulted in explosive elections

roleset.note: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to cleave.01. Cleave.01 is a member of VN class cling-22.5. Framed by Katie.
